title: "Neural Web Art"
content:
# Neural Web Art

Welcome to Neural Web Art, a website dedicated to showcasing digital art inspired by neural networks and artificial intelligence. Our collection features works from talented artists around the world who use these cutting-edge technologies to create stunning and thought-provoking pieces.

Explore our gallery to discover a diverse range of styles and mediums, from abstract paintings to intricate sculptures. Each work is unique, but all share a common thread: they are created using algorithms that mimic the human brain's neural networks.

Our mission is to promote the intersection of art and technology and to provide a platform for artists who are pushing the boundaries of what is possible with AI. Whether you are an art lover or a tech enthusiast, we invite you to join us on this journey into the future of creativity.

prompts.title:
Write me short (max 3 words) title for website with main wallpaper that is:

"A pattern of interconnected nodes and lines resembling a neural network"

The title should not be 1:1 copy of the prompt but rather a short description of the website which is using this wallpaper.
prompts.content:
Write me some content for this website in markdown format.
The content should be a short description of the website which is using this wallpaper.

Do not describe the wallpaper itself, but rather the website which is using it.
